https://firebase.google.com/docs/database/web/read-and-write?authuser=0
https://firebase.google.com/docs/database/web/lists-of-data?authuser=0




//creates a reference to users node/List
var UsersRef =firebase.database().ref('users')

// Create a new User reference with an auto-generated id
var newUserRef = UsersRef.push();
newUserRef.set({
//.....Add the rest of the user data
});


/*

    users for the web are two



*/
